results.deck: Sector's Edge
results.description:
Sector's Edge is a voxel-based first person shooter currently in alpha, in which two teams of 8 battle in a completely destructible environment across various planets. Gameplay is based around a territory control gamemode, with various themed maps and a vast array of weapons and tools to mould the environment and wipe out the opposition.

The game is developed by Vercidium and his brother Rocket Skeleton, who is the game's artist. It is built on a custom engine written in C# and has been in development for over a year and a half. The game has a Steam page that you can find through the catalogue search, however it is currently pending, with the view to officially enter Early Access in fall of 2019.
results.name: Sector's Edge

results.deck: Combining the adrenaline-filled futuristic racing of WipEout with the motorbike combat of the Road Rash series, Motor Raid is a Japanese-exclusive arcade racing game by Sega.
results.description:
Overview

Motor Raid is a 3D sci-fi motorcycle racing game developed by Sega's AM1 division and released by Sega for arcades (using their Sega Model 2 hardware) exclusively in Japan on 1997.

The game was sold as conversion kits for the 1995 game Manx TT Super Bike and utilizes the same motorbike-style controller (which leans, similar to the deluxe cabinet for Super Hang-On). Released on either single (one-player) or twin (two-player) cabinets, up to four players can play at a time with linked machines.

While the game received no dedicated home ports, it was later included as a bonus game in the 2018 PlayStation 4 game Judgment.

Racers

  • I.O (Jupiter) - Highest Attack, high Speed, average Acceleration/Grip.
  • Robin (Jacinth) - Highest Grip, high Acceleration, low Attack/Speed.
  • Geila (Hermit) - High Acceleration, average Attack/Speed, low Grip.
  • Gunz (Galgalim) - Highest Speed, high Attack, average Grip, low Acceleration.

Stages

  • Yendas
  • Ido
  • Junos
  • Reef8
  • Bowel
  • Segal (requires a cheat code to play in Practice)
results.name: Motor Raid

results.deck: Celestial Crusade is an idle RPG. Players join a fantasy world filled with classical beast and monsters and is available for Android and iOS.
results.description: Celestial Crusade is a modern idle RPG by Rainbow Horse Limited. Players start the game as one of the heroes who need to save the world from the forces of evil. The setting is a fantasy world filled with classical beast and monsters. The graphic style is retro, with an isometric view. Players can customize their character with better equipment, collect and improve pets, and join Legions with other players to fight bosses or other Legions.
results.name: Celestial Crusade

results.deck: A small one-player run-and-jump action puzzle game. Dodge falling boxes, wrap them up in tape, then stomp them in stacks to rack up combos!
results.description:
Combo Postage is a small one-player run-and-jump action puzzle game. Join Sue on her part time job at a weird underground shipping facility! Dodge falling boxes, wrap them up in tape, then stomp them in stacks to rack up combos.

Info

Difficult fast-paced risk-vs-reward puzzle action!

Let taped boxes pile up for potential combos, but try not to get too greedy. The higher the stack, the closer it gets to being toppled by an indestructible skull box! Oh, and watch out for the occasional laser blast or plume of flame.

Rebindable three button controls for both keyboard and gamepad.

Move, jump, climb, and stomp with just three buttons!

Custom mode!

Turn on and off hazards, increase or decrease the amount of boxes that appear at the start, and more!

Check your stats!

See just how many packages you've helped ship out in the records room! If you're feeling social, maybe chat with whoever's working?
results.name: Combo Postage
